Posts.Content: Kalie, I was diagnosed with breast cancer when I was 28 years old. The difference is that I had 10 out of 17 positive nodes and it was stage IIB. When you are young, the doctors treat your cancer very aggressively because your body can handle it.I did undergo a mastectomy, tram, radiation, and chemotherapy. Please check out my website if you get a chance. [url]http://www.jenaleber.com[/url]
Posts.Title: How did/do you feel during chemo?
